## ExpectInterface.a() method

Matches an instance of the provided class or primitive type. Examples:

1. `expect.a(MyClass)` - matches `new MyClass`<!-- -->, but not `new Other()` 2. `expect.a(String)` - matches `"foo"`<!-- -->, but not `123`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
a<T>(type: NewableOrPrimitive<T>): Class2Primitive<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | NewableOrPrimitive&lt;T&gt; | class or primitive constructor to match against. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Class2Primitive&lt;T&gt;
